description: Pricing Plan enables you to customize your billing details consistent with the usage that accrues in each of your billing groups.

PricingRuleArn.markdownDescription:
Pricing Rule ARN

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:aws(-cn)?:billingconductor::[0-9]{12}:pricingrule/[a-zA-Z0-9]{10}  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9_\+=\.\-@]+  
Update requires: No interruption

PricingRuleArns.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
Pricing Plan ARN

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:aws(-cn)?:billingconductor::[0-9]{12}:pricingplan/[a-zA-Z0-9]{10}  
Update requires: No interruption

Size.markdownDescription:
Number of associated pricing rules

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption
